feed.title: Kener Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Kener: 3.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • German Translation by @otherwiseGG in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/186
  • Add Russian translations and update locales.json by @kutovoys in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/187
  • Danish Translation by @otherwiseGG in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/190
  • Add Dutch Translation by @jghaanstra in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/194
  • Fix/day0 by @rajnandan1 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/195
  • korean translation update for v 3.0 by @sandyi5 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/201
  • fix: fixes #198 by @rajnandan1 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/202
  • feat: i18n for dates by @rajnandan1 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/204

New Contributors

  • @otherwiseGG made their first contribution in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/186
  • @kutovoys made their first contribution in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/187
  • @jghaanstra made their first contribution in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/194
  • @sandyi5 made their first contribution in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/201

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/compare/3.0.0...3.0.1

entry.title: New release for Kener: 3.0.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: localisation strings for further clarity by @cosmic-jellyfish in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/223
  • fix: locale for no incidents as reported in #225 by @rajnandan1 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/226

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/compare/3.0.4...3.0.5
